title: Perform checks on a .bib file ‚Äî check_bib
text: General Guidelines: Consistency great readability change future formating. following includes list general guidelines help increase consistency entries across files: use double quotes encase arguments within entry instead curly brackets use title-case letters type argument, e.g., Article, Manual Citation-Key: Citation keys first entry bibliography entry .bib file. citation-keys must unique across .bib files wish include given build. Therefore, strongly encourage users use dois citation keys available. dois unique, also allow consistency formatting compared combination author name, journal, year. important include special LaTeX characters citation key lead compiling errors. Remember citation keys TeX commands without escaping. Author: Many formatting styles valid .bib files Author field. important thing remember authors separated word '', e.g., author = "Doe, J. Smith, L.". format, last name first followed comma first initial first, preferred way include authors. Though TeX also accept first name followed last name. , highlight use former comma separator special entries Jr. can formatted way, format entries similarly create continuity less fatigue -boarding new users? example names, "Doe, J."" "Ford, Jr., Henry" "Steele Jr., Guy L." "von Beethoven, Ludwig"

Following workflow ensures author's address also added.

title: Initiate a sa4ss draft document, complete with directories and files ‚Äî draft
text: authors vector author names. example, "John R. Doe" without first name first. middle initial name optional. Entries must exactly match used "data-raw\authors.csv" file. need additional authors added file please contact package maintainers add .csv file run R script also found folder prior submitting pull request. Following workflow ensures author's address also added. species vector character strings providing species names species included stock assessment. Typically, one species, template can accommodate species complex well. species capitalized like see used middle sentence. example, "Pacific Hake" used stock assessment hake; "pacific hake" Pacific Hake preferred name, pacific hake. text can called document using spp form used middle sentence Spp placed beginning sentence. latin character string specifying Latin name without italic formatting. Please capitalize want used document though case altered. coast character string specifying part coast stock assessment includes. example, "US West". include "coast" added internally. type name template want initiate. default template sa, stands stock assessment. development sa4ss progresses, expect see templates become available. Available templates listed default function call. Specify single character value available want change type default. create_dir logical value leads draft document placed directory called "doc". default value FALSE uses current working directory rather containing files new directory, helpful want use name directory. TRUE create new directory "doc" copy necessary files . third option also exists, "default", allows rmarkdown::draft, determine appropriate directory structure. edit logical value, default FALSE, specifying want open indexing file editing default. software chosen R normally ideal file file normally edited users, sa4ss follow default value used rmarkdown::draft. ... Additional arguments wish pass rmarkdown::draft. See args(rmarkdown::draft).

text: dir directory look csv file list csv files create tex files . csv file format match table_labels.csv created r4ss function SSexecutivesummary. columns names folder caption, altcaption, label, filename, loc (optional). loc column directory location find file (filename) tex file created . dir can set mod_loc function automatically look inside table folder location. table_folder relative path table directory, must relative dir appended argument using file.path. alternative supply full file path dir use table_folder = "". save_loc optional input requires full path allow users save tex file specific location (e.g. inside doc folder) file.path(dir, table_folder). Default NULL csv_name CSV file name create tex table scripts . file following columns: caption, altcaption, label, filenem, loc (optional) caption table caption, altcapation accessibility text table (can NA caption used), label text reference table, filename file name csv file read, loc (optional) location file csv file indicated filename.

what:
The following script will look for the CSV file plotInfoTable created by r4ss
in order to automate some of the plots.  The plotInfoTable file is added to the
folder each time SS_plots is run (including when you update any of the plots)
The most recent version of plotInfoTable with the complete list of plots will
be used. ‚Äî get_plotinfo

what: Create an RData object specific for sa4ss ‚Äî read_model
title: Create an RData object specific for sa4ss ‚Äî read_model
text: Use r4ss::SS_output() read model output Stock Synthesis save resulting object .RData.

title: Create an RData object specific for sa4ss ‚Äî read_model
code: read_model(   mod_loc,   save_loc = NULL,   plotfolder = "plots",   printstats = deprecated(),   fecund_mult = "million eggs",   create_plots = TRUE,   png = deprecated(),   html = deprecated(),   datplot = deprecated(),   fleetnames = NULL,   forecastplot = TRUE,   maxrows = 4,   maxcols = 4,   bub_scale = 6,   create_tables = deprecated(),   ci_value = 0.95,   es_only = FALSE,   tables = c("a", "b", "c", "d", "e", "f", "g", "h", "i", "catch", "timeseries",     "numbers"),   divide_by_2 = FALSE,   adopted_ofl = NULL,   adopted_abc = NULL,   adopted_acl = NULL,   forecast_ofl = NULL,   forecast_abc = NULL,   ... )

title: Create an RData object specific for sa4ss ‚Äî read_model
text: mod_loc file path directory houses Stock Synthesis model used base model document. save_loc optional argument passed es_table_tex() pointing directory want .tex files saved . example, file.path(getwd(), "doc"). Use full paths. See es_table_tex() details default behavior .e., NULL, leads file.path(mod_loc, table_folder). plotfolder file path relative mod_loc figures saved. argument passed printfolder r4ss::SS_plots(). default plots. printstats printstats = FALSE longer supported; function always suppress printing output screen r4ss::SS_output(printstats = FALSE, verbose = FALSE). fecund_mult character string, providing multiplier fecundity terms eggs fecundity defined terms numbers within Stock Synthesis. default millions eggs billions thousands used. fecundity units, .e., r4ss::SS_output()$SpawnOutputUnits == "biomass", fecund_unit changed `fecund_unit = "mt". create_plots logical leads executing r4ss::SS_plots() creating suite r4ss figures, default TRUE. png png = FALSE longer supported; function always print graphics disk create_plots = TRUE, default behavior r4ss::SS_plots(). html html = TRUE longer supported; function always stop r4ss::SS_plots() running r4ss::SS_html(). datplot datplot = FALSE longer supported; plots data always created r4ss::SS_plots(datplot = TRUE). fleetnames vector user-defined fleet names. default behavior NULL leads use fleetnames = r4ss::SS_output$FleetNames. forecastplot forecastplot = FALSE longer supported; plots data always created r4ss::SS_plots(forecastplot = TRUE). behavior helps ensure users Stock Synthesis aware specifications present forecast file, .e., want display forecasts turn forecasting forecast.ss file. maxrows Number rows plots. Default set 4. maxcols Number columns plots. Default set 4. bub_scale Bubble scale size use plotting. Passed bub.scale.dat =  argument r4ss::SS_plots(). create_tables create_tables longer needed; call r4ss::SSexecutivesummary() made character vector passed tables argument, thus, old behavior create_tables = FALSE can recreated tables = NULL. ci_value single numerical value specifying desired confidence interval, default calculate 95% interval. ci_value passed r4ss::SSexecutivesummary(). es_only TRUE/FALSE switch produce executive summary tables produced, default FALSE return executive summary tables, historical catches, numbers--ages tables tables produce (default everything). Note: tables depend calculations related previous tables, fail requested (e.g., Table 'f' created without also creating Table '') divide_by_2 allow user calculate single sex values based new sex specification (-1) SS3 single sex models. Default value FALSE. TRUE divide 2. adopted_ofl Vector adopted ofl values printed mangagement performance table. vector 10 values. adopted_abc Vector adopted abc values printed mangagement performance table. vector 10 values. adopted_acl Vector adopted acl values printed mangagement performance table. vector 10 values. forecast_ofl Optional input vector management adopted OFL values table g. values overwrite OFL values projection table, rather model estimated OFL values. Example input: c(1500, 1300) forecast_abc Optional input vector management adopted ABC values table g. values overwrite ABC values projection table, rather model estimated ABC values. Example input: c(1500, 1300) ... Additional input arguments passed SS_output reading output files Stock Synthesis list.

title: Create an RData object specific for sa4ss ‚Äî read_model
text: RData object defined quantities sa4ss functions can easily used write documentation. Thus, saving users perform multiple similar calculations.

title: Create an RData object specific for sa4ss ‚Äî read_model
text: Chantel Wetzel

title: Create an RData object specific for sa4ss ‚Äî read_model
code: if (FALSE) { simplemod_loc <- tail(dir(   pattern = "simple",   system.file("extdata", package = "r4ss"),   full.names = TRUE ), 1) sa4ss::read_model(   mod_loc = simplemod_loc,   fecund_mult = "billion eggs" ) }

title: Custom table for sa4ss ‚Äî table_format
text: x R object, typically matrix data frame. format defined kableExtra::kbl(). Default sa4ss 'latex'. caption defined kableExtra::kbl(). label defined kableExtra::kbl(). digits defined kableExtra::kbl(). booktabs defined kableExtra::kbl(). Logical. col_names Names columns show table. linesep defined kableExtra::kbl(). longtable defined kableExtra::kbl(). font_size Font size pts. NULL, document font size used. align defined kableExtra::kbl(). col_names_align defined kableExtra::linebreak(). hold_position defined kableExtra::kable_styling(). Logical. escape defined kableExtra::kable_styling(). bold_header Make headers bold. Logical landscape Make table landscape orientation? repeat_header landscape, repeat header subsequent pages? header_grouping defined kableExtra::kable_styling() format.args defined kableExtra::kbl(). custom_width Logical. Allow custom column widths col_to_adjust Vector columns adjust width. used custom_width = TRUE. width Vector single value column widths (.e. c('2cm', '2cm')) columns defined col_to_adjust. create_png Logical. set true tables created png objects doc. ... Extra arguments supplied kbl.

title: Custom table for sa4ss ‚Äî table_format
code: table_format(head(iris)) #> Need to define label to reference table. #> \begingroup\fontsize{10}{12}\selectfont #> \begingroup\fontsize{10}{12}\selectfont #>  #> \begin{longtable}[t]{c>{\centering\arraybackslash}p{2.2cm}>{\centering\arraybackslash}p{2.2cm}>{\centering\arraybackslash}p{2.2cm}>{\centering\arraybackslash}p{2.2cm}} #> \caption{Add Caption}\\ #> \toprule #> Sepal.Length & Sepal.Width & Petal.Length & Petal.Width & Species\\ #> \midrule #> \endfirsthead #> \caption[]{Add Caption \textit{(continued)}}\\ #> \toprule #> Sepal.Length & Sepal.Width & Petal.Length & Petal.Width & Species\\ #> \midrule #> \endhead #>  #> \endfoot #> \bottomrule #> \endlastfoot #> 5.1 & 3.5 & 1.4 & 0.2 & setosa\\ #> 4.9 & 3.0 & 1.4 & 0.2 & setosa\\ #> 4.7 & 3.2 & 1.3 & 0.2 & setosa\\ #> 4.6 & 3.1 & 1.5 & 0.2 & setosa\\ #> 5.0 & 3.6 & 1.4 & 0.2 & setosa\\ #> 5.4 & 3.9 & 1.7 & 0.4 & setosa\\* #> \end{longtable} #> \endgroup{} #> \endgroup{}

title: Compile Title in YAML format ‚Äî write_title
text: species vector character strings providing species names species included stock assessment. Typically, one species, template can accommodate species complex well. species capitalized like see used middle sentence. example, "Pacific Hake" used stock assessment hake; "pacific hake" Pacific Hake preferred name, pacific hake. text can called document using spp form used middle sentence Spp placed beginning sentence. latin character string specifying Latin name without italic formatting. Please capitalize want used document though case altered. coast character string specifying part coast stock assessment includes. example, "US West". include "coast" added internally. year numeric character string specifying year. default uses Sys.Date() format year four digit character value. fileout file path file saved disk. Typically, full relative paths allowed.

title: Compile Title in YAML format ‚Äî write_title
text: Latin name specified "latin" argument encased underscores facilitate italicized. Using emph allowed tagging structure creation 508 compliant pdf render LaTex code . Nevertheless, use markdown inside yaml seems work just fine.
